full_text: Fighting disease is like fighting fire. It’s not enough to put out most of it — you have to get it all. @Rotary’s generous pledge to the Global Polio Eradication Initiative will help us extinguish this terrible disease for good. https://t.co/OHdVufsVrF

quoted_status.full_text:
2 years ago: 🌎 leaders joined @Rotary & other GPEI partners to pledge >$1.2B to help #EndPolio. 

Today: the latest GPEI strategy outlines a plan to achieve a polio-free world. Let's make sure it has the resources it needs to get there 💪. https://t.co/AzzK9qucfx https://t.co/eIOtYdjhH9
